name: LA Nightmare Final Form (Autoghost)
author: ywkls
info: Recreates the final form of the Nightmare from Link's Awakening.
description: The main body has two tails that circle it. These tails are invulnerable.Sprites by Ricky of Kokiri.Update 6-26-15- Now supports ghost.zh!Update: 6-28-15- Altered code to avoid potential bugs caused by ghosted movement.Update: 8-16-15- Changed tail rotation to be more random. Added explosive death animation.
setup: Set up three enemies. The main boss, a 2 x 2 sprite. The tail segments, 1 x1. The tail spike, also 1 s 1,Set up one combo for the main boss.Requires-std.zhstdExtra.zhffcscript.zhstring.zhghost.zh
